ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Sep 1999, Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:
>
> Hmm, I was in cazic last night, when my favorite
> cleric started wacking me. Why? I've been nice to
> him, ah, he's charmed. Hmm, ranger is also wacking
> me. This isn't good. So I start charming back. It
> seemed to work, I wasn't getting wacked any more.
> This was moments before our entire sever crashed for 3
> hours. I'm sure it was my fault :)

I think the change only applies to summoned pets. They really
should make it consistent with how player pets work. If my
mage friend is killed, his pet suicides. If I kill that NPC
necro who has somehow managed to summon 7 pets, they should
all suicide. Unless memblur/atone/fear were fixed as ways to
quick-kill NPC pets, this nerf is aimed squarely at bards.
